snippet: Representative Sue Myrick of North Carolina, a conservative Republican who represents a Charlotte-based district, said she would step down at the end of her 10th term.
abstract: Representative Sue Myrick of North Carolina, a conservative Republican who represents a Charlotte-based district, said she would step down at the end of her 10th term.
lead_paragraph: Representative Sue Myrick, the first Republican woman to represent North Carolina in Congress, announced Tuesday that she would  not seek re-election this year.

headline.main: North Carolina Congresswoman Is Stepping Down
